Job creation and job statuses
1. The work is created by the Customer.
After the Customer has sent a request to create a work, the work will have a status - created.
This is the original status of the job.
2. After that, the search algorithm for a suitable provider for work is launched.
The search algorithm runs every 5 minutes (now such settings).
At this time, the job status changes to - searching.
3. If the provider is not found, the job status changes to - providers_not_found.
The customer will receive a notification that it is not possible to find a provider to work with.
In fact, further searches do not continue. Perhaps you should apologize to Customer and offer to try again.
4. If the provider finds, then the job will change its status to = providers_found.
And a job_quote (request for execution) is created, which is associated with the job and sent to the provider.
The provider receives a notification that a job request has been received, and a record of an invitation to perform a job (job_quote) appears. This job request has status = requested. For the provider here it will be necessary to check for a job request.
Now the provider needs to be given a choice - either to accept the job request and announce the price, or to reject it.
The customer also receives a notification that a job offer has been sent.
4.1. If the provider rejects the invitation, then the status of job_quote = refused.
The status of the job itself does not change. The search for providers continues.
The customer will receive a notification that the job request has not been accepted.
4.2. If the provider accepts the invitation, then the status of job_quote = given.
those. it will be necessary from the Provider's side to send an update to job_quote indicating
prices and status status (see doc)
The job status also changes job = accepted.
The customer will receive a notification that the job offer has been accepted.

After discussion with Pavel and Samat. It was decided that we've simplified the database relations related to the Job Request.
1. We'll make a direct connection of Customer to Job (Customer has many Jobs).
3. We'll remove direct connection of Customer to location. The reason for this, customer could have many locations, for example, an office, a house of his/her parent, summer house and so on.
2. Then we've connect a job with Location. So, it is more obvious where the job is required.
3. We'll add Quote table to be connected to Provider and to Job.
4. Then we implement 3 endpoints:
 * Create a job by a Customer.
 * Create a quote by a Provider.
 * Accept or reject a quote by a Customer.

[~ducla5] Researched reset password functionality. Checked it in staging and prod. There appears an error in both Prod and Staging. After clicking on "Forgot password?" link I was redirected to AccountKit page. Researched AccountKit service. I turns out that AccountKit is the Facebook's service for authentication without using passwords. AccountKit's workflow is as follow it uses emails and phone numbers where it sends codes, after which a user should enter that code and if the code is valid a user gets redirected back to their page where special callback handlers handle the data with user's token. If everything in that workflow is ok the page for changing password is opened and a user will be able to type new password.
But this service AccountKit is no longer supported, it's deprecated henceforth. These are some official accrticles on that
[https://developers.facebook.com/blog/post/2019/09/09/account-kit-services-no-longer-available-starting-march/]
[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/accountkit/]
That's why we had better to replace it with something else. For restoring passwords via SMS send to phone numbers we can use Twillio service which's one of the most popular and the best ones . But Oleg said that Twillio has some problems with Vietnamese phone services and may be we had better to use something Vietnamese. Can you suggest something regarding this issue? Or we can use Twillio?

[~ducla5]

The reason i reopened the ticket is to review one issue related to _*Terms and Condition acceptance*_. By the business requirements _Terms and Condition_ should be accepted by a user, so as we have the Terms and Condition acceptance step is the last and there could a case when the sign-up process could be terminated by accident. But on the previous steps all filled in data are saved, so further a user without acceptance can already sign-in and use the services at all.
I think the simplest solution of the issue is to create an endpoint that checks the acceptance.

[~kairat] the simplest way to solve it is adding one more attribute to a response after sign-in. It would be a boolean attribute, which described have users accept the terms or not. Then the frontend can add a message to users about this state. And disable functions if it's needed.
another issue is there is no endpoint of customers to specify which kind of notification to receive - email, sms or both.

cause I'm not sure if we want to restrict this service to UK only

*About postcodes*

We use `getaddress.io` for getting postcodes info. This service provides only UK postcodes. If we want to provide other countries postcodes, I think we should integrate with more third-party services.

*About mobile*

It depends on our decision about postcodes. If we will provide only UK postcodes, that's why we'll add support of mobile without country code. Otherwise, we'll save this validation, because now we wait for users from all of the world.

I that I can find actual magento token at [https://admin-staging.edumall.vn/admin/admin/]. I compared it with existing token at [https://env.edumall.io/] and found that they were different. I replaced it with the correct one and that helped.

After this mobile developer Alex told us, that request to */api/v5/courses/detail* still failed.

I had a chance to reproduce it locally. That happened because there were no similar courses in database and codebase didn't cover this case. The same thing happened on staging. We the team we decided to update the staging db with the current production db, because it is the most quick and effective solution.

That helped me to find that magento-mobile-api([https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api]) service doesn't work for staging and causes 500 errors.

*Actual state:*

Pikamon([https://git.edumall.io/tcs/pikamon]):
 * wrong url for [https://git.edumall.io/backend/sol] service | FIXED
 * wrong MAGENTO_TOKEN | FIXED
 * DB inconsistent | FIXED

Ares([https://git.edumall.io/tcs/ares]) - no troubles so far

Magento mobile api([https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api]):
 * returns 500 error for each response | FIX IN PROGRESS

*Report:*

Magento mobile api([https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api]) doesn't work.

*Next Step:*

Inspect logs - [https://log.tsts.edumall.io/search?rangetype=relative&fields=message%2Csource&width=1440&highlightMessage=&relative=300&q=file%3A%5C%2Fvar%5C%2Flog%5C%2Fcontainers%5C% 2F*ecommerce-magento-mobile-api-gateway-staging*]

*Report:*

Inspected the logs but they didn't contain anything useful.

Cloned the repo to my local machine and inspected how it works in general.

Decided to go through env variables and check them each.

Asked DevOps Dmitrii to help me check connectivity for each dependency from the staging server.

Together with Dmitrii we checked all variables and found that app container regularly fell down.

We decided to check logs from docker container.

From the logs we found that rds certificate had expired and main application could not connect to mysql database. Dmitry updated it.

After that application health check request passed.

*Next Step:*

Test staging android mobile application.

*Report:*

I tested android app and it works, except:
 * category images not showing
 * cities list doesn't load

Normally js bundling is not enabled because it produces big js files (can be configured manually), which is more harm than good, especially on mobile. But looks like js bundling processor from this module works better than native in magento. While it still significantly reduces the number of requests, it keeps bundle size relatively small. (new errors appeared in the console nonetheless)
||key||requests||bundle size||
|disabled (current)|~300|0|
|native|~120|~2.5mb|
|module (good)|~140|~400Kb|

I made a request for support.

Hello.
 We want to use your service.
 We want to use Infrastructure, log management and APM.
 We use autoscaling from AWS, two instances are constantly running, but sometimes the number of instances grows to 4 or more, the lifetime of such instances is 30 minutes to several hours.

Could you please tell us how the cost of the service will be considered in this case?
 As far as I understand, the cost is not counted by hours ?

For example, we have two instances for which the following services are included
 Infrastructure - 18 x 2 = $36/month
 Log Management - 1.91 × 2 = 3.82$/month
 APM - $36 x 2 = $72/month
 Total: ~ 111.82$

But if the number of instances temporarily increases from 2 to 4, how will this affect the monthly cost?
 Thank you so much for your help.

[~puzanov@gmail.com], Pagespeed simply checking above the fold content and % of styles it uses during rendering. Let's say we have 100kb of styles, above the fold content uses only 10kb. This tool suggests to write 10Kb of css inline and to load 90Kb later. There are a lot of stylesheets in magento in different modules, need to manually check every single one of them, find places which is used in above the fold content, and move them to inline. This is a lot of work. What I can do quick, it just load entire css later, but in this case, site will look in a following way while styles loading:

!417_1.png|thumbnail!!417_2.png|thumbnail!
As a result, we will have green mark, but the score will not change, as well as load time for user. In magento projects, styles usually remain as they are - 100 KB is not a problem since 2010.

Css duplicates have been removed. Merge service now works properly on the category/product/search page.

!417_3.png|thumbnail!

[~azat17] I've updated info about timeout workflow of contact:
 * Step 1: When user register in LDP, his info will be saved in Marol system.
 * Step 2: User is redirected to epayment.edumall.co.th
 * Step 3.1: if user submits payment form, online payment is done in payment backend
 * Step 3.2: if user does not submit, online payment backend can not save anything. In mean while, Marol system will has a cronjob to scan to find out timeout c3 contact to update

Please see this workflow in here:

[https://itwiki.topica.vn/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=IEMM&title=Contact-Follow]

Marol project:

[https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/marol]

payment backend project:

[https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment]

Expected functions:

We need to implement 2 features:
- In frontend, we need allowing user can choose payment method, like COD, Credit card, ATM,…
- Create a timeout mechanism. In frontend, we create a countdown. After this countdown ends, if users does not submit payment form, they will be redirect to a page that notify session timeout. In the mean while, our backend must update this contact status to `timeout`

[~ducla5] As i understood you the Marol holds the contacts registered in Landings and updates their statuses to timeout providing they don't do anything in epayment.edumall.co.th during the first 10 minutes. But what time should this 10 minutes be counted from? I suppose after 10 minutes user should be redirected to a page of Marol? I suggest to make a call with [~kirill] [~gen1us2k] and me on Monday to discuss this subject because it seems to me that payment process involves multiple steps including several microservices. We should made clear the communications between these services

!epayment-tl.png!

https://epayment.edumall.co.th/payment-option-v5.html?domain=testlandingpageit06.edumall.co.th&cid=5ea4069a450173000d000000&course_id=BC.hungdv2.test.01



domain: is domain of LDP

Cid: customerId

course_id: is course's id



How it works:

- User click submit form in LDP.

- Redirect to payment

- Countdown 10:00 minutes (if user does not click submit button)

- After expiring, payment will notify payment is expired and after user click “Ok” it will return to LDP domain

How payment works:

- User has 2 options: online payment and COD.

- If user clicks on Online payment, an online payment form will be displayed

- If user clicks on COD, nothing display (default option).

- After user chooses payment option, he can click confirm button

+ If user choose COD —> redirect to thankyou page (epayment.edumall.co.th/cod-v2A.html)

+ If user choose Online payment:

How to click Submit:

- See setSubmitEvent function in main.js

- If user choose COD —> go to epayment.edumall.co.th/cod-v2A.html

- If user choose Online payment, see event handler of credit button

How to display contact info:

- Call this request https://epayment.edumall.co.th/contact/view?cid=5eacf0f788ae030009000910

How to display order info:

- See loadCourseData function in main.js

hi guys,

Latest update

1/ I set up the tracking on LDP with a form submission, on payment

Currently, we don't have tracking on thankyou page, working on it

Problems
 * I found that we lost the tracking on epayment, I just update it last night, so need ~ 1 days to collect the data

2/ I tried to reproduce 2 cases
 * Timeout session

I can reproduce this case by

Step 1) Go to the LDP with OP option [https://chinesetoday-english.edumall.co.th/]

Step 2) Input the information

Step 3) Choose OP

Step 4) At the epayment, I don't input anything, wait for > 10 mins

Step 5) Input the information

Expected: at step 4) I should get the notice session timeout

Actual: I don't get any notice, the Omise gateway still process my information but in contactc3s, it recorded me timeout already

So, it's not centralized between the User's process and Database process
 Detail here, row 6

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_2ZPJQn5FNWdAflJyrPuGupkw14FycYZjqCuIvXSfX4/edit#gid=0]



So my suggestion is that we need to implement the session count down here and prevent the user's confusing when they're in epayment.

Firstly i quickly went through the code that runs the transcoding commands. I tried to reproduce them in rails console manually running there the code of transcoding and found that
Open3.popen3(some ffmpeg commands) call which is used to catch error data from Stderr stream of Linux the example is here https://git.edumall.io/tcs/vis/blob/master/lib/ffmpeg/movie.rb #L73 . If follow this link and look at the code you'll find stderr object that should contain an error, but official documentation of ffmpeg says "ffmpeg sends all diagnostic messages (the "console output") to stderr because its actual output (the media stream ) can go to stdout and mixing the diagnostic messages with the media stream would brake the output." - which lead to that as i figured it out even if we get errors or success stderr contains exactly the same structure of an object except that a message can be different (in case of error a message will contain error explanation) and it makes it hard to differ completed steps from failed ones. That's why i think the previous developer set "try catch" block in "perform" function https://git.edumall.io/tcs/vis/blob/master/app/workers/output_worker.rb#L48 to catch all errors of any type appearing in this worker responsible for transcoding. No matter if this error occurred because of other errors or transcoding. The data in logs refers to that "try catch" block. And the question is - can we send notifications to Admin in that try catch block considering that errors wouldn't always be exactly related to transcoding cause it could be any bug appearing in that worker ?
2) Can i get the video lessons after uploading which there have been transcoding errors? I want to dive a bit deeply into what could be wrong because i tried to transcode some videos from my computer in my local vis and i didn't get errors, except when i tried to transcode let's say PDF or word files to video formats.

[~ducla5] i also need a gmail account from which these error messages would be sent. *FAQ How to Clear Cache on Power BI Query Editor:*

1. Open Query Editor in Power Bi using Transform Data Button on Main Screen

!image-2020-05-06-13-02-19-834.png!!image-2020-05-06-13-05-28-599.png!

2. In opened window of Query Editor press File button

!image-2020-05-06-13-07-57-230.png!

3. In opened list press Options and Settings and then Options

!image-2020-05-06-13-10-31-069.png!
 !image-2020-05-06-13-12-35-214.png! 4. In opened Options window you can see opened Data Load menu, on the right side use two Clear Cache buttons
 !image-2020-05-06-13-16-46-433.png!

*FAQ How to filter column list for table in Power BI Query Editor without preloading all columns:*
 # **Add new query in window of Query Editor using right click on empty space in list of Queries and choose proper data source:

!image-2020-05-06-13-27-12-788.png!
 # In opened Navigator window choose data table needed on left side and click OK on right side

!image-2020-05-06-13-33-05-693.png!
 # In main Query Editor new query should have been opened. And now we need to manually modify the query field of it. For it we need to press on main query field
!image-2020-05-06-13-38-11-692.png!
And wrap value that was automatically generated in additional structures.
For getting full list of columns we should use *Table.Schema(table).*
In this example, It should look like *= Table.Schema(MAROL_Schema\{[Name="CAMPAIGNS",Kind="Table"]}[Data])*
Hitting enter would provide list of all cloumns that we can use with types and all information available
!image-2020-05-06-13-45-07-857.png!

Now when we know what columns are available and what columns we want to you, we need to wrap around auto-generated query with *Table.SelectColumns(table, \{"COLUMN1","COLUMN2"}*
In this example, it should look like *= Table.SelectColumns(MAROL_Schema\{[Name="CAMPAIGNS",Kind="Table"]}[Data], \{"_ID", "NAME"})*
!image-2020-05-06-13-52-45-464.png!
And now in Preview WIndow there would be only columns we selected and this query would return only them.

I found out that this issue arised because of two problems:
 * connection with marol seems to be a little bit slow
 * orders table contains too many columns(108 to be exact)

Every time we tried to get data from Orders table it tried to load preview of 1000 rows with 108 columns, due to not very fast connection it was failing by timeout and trying again and by this it trashed cache.
To solve this problem I :
 * cleared cache of query editor because failing orders connect trashed it too much
 * added Table.SelectColumns to step of getting data from orders_table, so power bi now takes only columns you need instead of all 108
 * restored connection properties to odbc driver
 * wrote FAQs for cache clear and table.selectcolumns usage

Hi,

I can do it by myself, thank you so much

1. Old gitlab server, does not support downstream jobs with triggers.
2. We can separately trigger a pipeline in the qa repository, wait for execution assurance and trigger the job in the magento repository.
In this case we have to run through the repositories to check the artifacts and execution of the pipeline.
3. Option with cloning the qa repository and run tests in the same piping. In this case, the artifacts are saved from root, at the second build cleaning of the build directory causes errors with permissions.
 * We can change rights for the solution, but then you need to give gitlab-runner sudo for chown.
 * We need to change the docker file for qa, in this case we can run processes in the node runner from another user.
4. We can run a job on docker-runner, at that point we need to prepare an image to run which will docker-compose, git, and we also need to deploy key to clone the repository.

Made the fastest option 3, gave sudo rights to the user gitlab-runner, the option is not very, but working and the fastest.

As for the launch of tests, the tests should be run on a deferred basis, i.e. after depositing new AMIs in the staging.
I create a file with commit name in the directory available nginx, wait for the file to appear, as the file becomes available, run tests.

(just for the history. may be helpful in the future)
 * Table `customer_entity_text` contains customer attributes (custom attrbiutes) and has ~30gb of data on production. If site continue to grow it can easily hit 100gb+. The solution here to check why it was designed this way and prospose improvements.
 * Table `mageplaza_smtp_log` has ~17gb of data on production. Just need to turn on auto clean in admin panel.
 * Edumall/Theme/view/frontend/templates/html/catalogProduct/catalog.product.review.phtml takes 1.5-4sec to load on first hit. Few requests to LMS happens inside. Requests are cached, but will be better to load this block through ajax in separate request or implement magento-to-lms data sync via cron job.
(this activity will not improve system performance in general)

Server side is ok. FPC in magento was fixed and it improved response time, but we can't use it in prod now, because some blocks with user data are rendered on server in the same request as main page. It will be fixed in next iteration.

There are some problems now for connecting to new database via power bi

Found out the source of the problem - Power BI connectors doesn't have certificates for connections for AWS RDS, so we need to include them manually.

To do this we need to *download* [^rds-combined-ca-bundle.p7b], *right-click* on this file, press *Install certificate* and follow Certificate installation wizard without any additions. At the step of *Certificate Store* you need to choose *Place all certificates in the following store* and using *Browse* button use *Trusted Root Certification Authorities,* so this window should look like this:
!image-2020-05-07-14-00-10-917.png! . Then you need to click *Yes* for all certificates when there would be a question about trusted source

1. We can't use one database, because when we build a new magento, Radik changes will be added and it can kill the current production.
2. We need a copy of the database from which the magento will be build and the new prod will work.
3. Problems with rollback, take a snapshot from a new production with Radik changes and rollback on the old production can not, because there are Radik changes, we need to rebuild the old prod (((( Or hope that nothing breaks.
4. In any case, when rolling back the old production, we will have the database's asynchronous.
1. Do not use Radik's changes.
2. Test the new product again for possible errors and problems to avoid rolling back to the old production.

MySQL query for getting info about time from each collection of db. You need to *set db variable* to schema you wish to execute it on before using.


{code:java}
SET @db = 'schemaName';

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len = 10000000;

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(qry SEPARATOR ' UNION ALL ')
INTO @sql
FROM(
         select CASE
                    WHEN
                            exists
                                (SELECT 1
                                 FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                                 WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'updated_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                            AND
                            exists(SELECT 1
                                   FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                                   WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'created_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(GREATEST(MAX(created_at),MAX(updated_at)), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time,COUNT(*) AS rows_count FROM ', @db, '.',
                                    table_name)
                    WHEN
                        exists
                            (SELECT 1
                             FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                             WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'updated_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(updated_at), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time,COUNT(*) AS rows_count FROM ', @db, '. ', table_name)
                    WHEN
                        exists
                            (SELECT 1
                             FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                             WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'created_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(created_at), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time, COUNT(*) AS rows_count FROM ', @db, '. ', table_name)
                    ELSE CONCAT(
                            'SELECT table_name AS table_name, DATE_FORMAT(GREATEST(CREATE_TIME, COALESCE(UPDATE_TIME,\'1900-01-01\')), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ'') AS last_time, TABLE_ROWS AS row_count FROM information_schema.tables where table_name =\'',
                            TABLE_NAME, '\'')
                    END qry
         FROM information_schema.TABLES t
         WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @db
     ) a;

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len = 1024;

PREPARE dynamic_statement FROM @sql;
EXECUTE dynamic_statement;
DEALLOCATE PREPARE dynamic_statement;
{code}

Magento staging and general changes.

https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/

1. Fixed the staging deploy, reworked pipilene.
2. Removed the CRON instance, now the cron tasks is running on ADMIN instance.
3. Added a rule for /sitemap.xml, when requesting sitemap get to the ADMIN instance , this is need this to ensure that when generating a new sitemap file was available from a single instance - ADMIN.
4. Now when building changes Radik are available immediately.
5. Made IAM role to describe ec2 instance.
6. Updated the ssh keys in the base image.
7. Made a script to get IP for staging instances
8. Added Radik to the staging bastion.
9. Turned on the CDN, images started loading faster.
10. Understood with Radik why changes in the admin panel are not available.

New production
https://newprod.edumall.vn/
1. Created redis for new production
2. Created a temporary base for production from the snapshot for May 2.
3. Created a temporary Elastic Search
4. I've prepared the pipeline for the production deploy
5. Prepared a new packer config for production.
6. Changed variables in packer-json, added variables in Gitlab-ci.
7. Updated ASG.
8. Created LA, TG and rules to redirect from http to https, sitemap and admin.
9. Created a bastion to the new production
10. Created gitla-runner for production, set up a gitlab-runner, installed composer, php7.2 and a bunch of packages, patch, jq, added a key for repository.
11. Changed the current prod branch to prod_old
Deploy for production will be from this branch.
12. Directed the domain newprod.edumall.vn to the production LA

I chased for this error locally and in the end the result seemed to be the same as i supposed earlier. The error appears because in preview.js script at the line 46 it gets the url value from href attribute like so var href = $(this).attr('href') and tries to do this replacing action href = href.replace( /d1mjfb268gelin.cloudfront.net/g, "daevt1q1a24kq.cloudfront.net"). This action are being taken on the element with class equal to .lecture-preview. But its content can either have or not have the href attribute based on its asset_type field. When asset_type field's value is other than 'Video' then the .lecture-preview element remain without href element and replacing function is executed on the href attribute which's null.

[~khalezin.d] after viewing your results, I have some comments:
 * Edumall VN is using hostvn.net CDN. This CDN will use S3 as its origin.
 * I've audited some systems and seen some reasons that made videos were still requested from Cloudfront:
 ** They use a backup method for video player, if it can not request chunk from hostvn.net CDN, it'll request from Cloudfront.
 ** When uploading and transcoding videos, if some problem happen, for example video is not transcoded successfully, video will be played from Cloudfront, in mp4 format.
 * About moving data to glacier layer, we need to evaluate carefully to make a decision because this layer is used for only store, not for retreave.
 * Pedia-lecture-video and kelley-lecture-video are origin of Edumall Vietnam and Edumall Thailand.
https://dox.google.com/spredsheets/d/1tsg8WKTHJJwJ8Jay04Fd3xLxIhLl68OiIFTAEZEYCHKI/edit?success=sharing

[~ducla5]

I researched CDN and here's what I think.

* Cheap CDNs do not have POP in the regions we need, but their use significantly reduces the cost of the delivery of content, such as bunnycdn.com or cdn77.com.

* A good option in my opinion is cloudflare.com, CDN use for free, Business account for $200. But for large data transfers it is better to contact cloudflare support for more information about the cost.

Also very interesting variant with the use of Cloudflare stream streaming service, using this service we can remove transcoding infrastructure, remove the use of cloudfront, remove the local CDN in Vietnam, because CLoudflate has its POP in this location, remove the use of S3 for video storage.


What do you think of this?

How hard will it be to implement?

Here is more detailed information on CDN prices.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cg8VKTXDGJvJ8Jaj04Fd3xLxYhLl68OiYFtAEzEQ4CI/edit?usp=sharing

For this question - "if it supports S3 private buckets"
I don't quite know what you mean.

[~khalezin.d]:
 * About changing CDN provider, it's not difficult. All we need is setting up a new CDN link and changing link play in LMS system.
 * I don't know if Cloudflare support VOD in 200$ price layer. Kevin has said that it's not cheap if we used their VOD CDN service. So we need to know detail about that. We've already had Cloudflare account and we're using its service.
 * About my question "if it supports S3 private buckets" because: now, Edumall is using public S3 bucket origin for CDNs, it's unsecure for videos, people can download them so if CDN providers can support private S3 bucket (S3 ready support) is better.

[~ducla5]

Cloudflare Stream looks very good for our purpose, but we need to calculate the length of all the videos and their view numbers. Only after that, we can have an objective assessment of the cost of using this service.

If the cost will be okay for us, we can stop using the following services:
 #cloudfront
 # Vietnamese CDN, since Cloudflare has its POP in Vietnam
 # S3 and the data transfer to Cloudflare storage
 # Infrastructure for transcoding video, as Cloudflare will take over this function

In addition, we will be able to protect content using Signed URLs service.

Switching to Cloudflare is a quite complicated process and we will not be able to migrate to Cloudflare quickly.

We can use a cheap CDN as an interim option.

For example:
 *https://gcorelabs.com/
 *POP in Thailand
 *~$2000 for 50 TB
 * VOP support
 * No Private S3 support

 * https://cdn77.com
 * No POP for Thailand
 * ~$580 for 50 TB
 * VOP support
 * No Private S3 support

If this option suits you, we can start the implementation of the integration (using the testing staging to test it before).

CDN providers usually have a test period, so we can connect the CDN to an S3 bucket. On the staging environment, we will be able to integrate a new URL for videos and test the CDN operation.

What do you think about that?

Let's discuss with Kevin about pros and cons of these solutions.

[~leonov.rs@gmail.com], here [~r.krasnov] is asking:

During the execution and testing of redirects, I found that redirects do not quite fit.
I would like to clarify about redirects.
Magento has the ability to do semantic urls and redirects, but they work in different ways.
There is a request path - this is teacher/name, and the target path is teacher/view/id
if you set a 301 redirect, then when you click on the teacher/name link, it will redirect to teacher/view/id.
If the request path and the target path are reversed, then nothing will be received, since the redirect will happen on a nonexistent page.
I need to understand why a 301 redirect is needed. If this is so critical, then perhaps a solution will have to be a router (this is not a difficult task).
But, if we take products in Magento as an example, then each product has an original path catalog/ product/view/id, which can have a semantic path tackets/jacket-yellow/. The main code in the magento on the pages contains exactly catalog/product/view/id, which goes as a target path.
To generate tackets/jacket-yellow/ in the address bar and on the pages Urls rewrites are used, but not redirects.
Therefore, it is important to understand why redirects are needed. If they are needed, I will try to add a router. If they are not needed, then I do everything by analogy with the products.

In general, judging by the few tests that I looked at, you, [~tshatmanaliev], will need to go over the already prepared tests and add specific testing of the component's logic, and not just calling the component and its methods.
I saw this in the Breadcurmbs, CardSelector components
For example in the CardSelector it takes and calls all the methods, which is fine, but it doesn't check for what should happen, for example, if I click on the left arrow or drag the component. What's the point then in a test that just tests for the component to render? It is important to transfer the locked data there and test its actions and output at the same time. Suddenly, for example, someone will make such changes that the component will continue to render, but clicking on the left arrow will stop responding? How then can these tests help us detect such a problem before it gets to production?

And yes, this does not mean that the problem is only in those two tests that I indicated. I just did not look further, assuming that there is the same trouble. So I strongly recommend that you look at other tests as well.

Lexx, it's good that they notified right away. In the last 12 MRs, as you can see, there were no comments of this kind. I thought if it passes in coverage, then there is no need to re-test somehow. Not all MRs have this problem, only the last two. I tested the logic, the only thing to note is that we could not access the <Form /> elements. In this regard, the inputs could not be simulated. Please help me solve this problem.

But I would not recommend putting such functions on a pin code at all. It is not clear what problem this solves, it creates a pin-scan-pin-payment flow, which is very confusing and creates additional cases of possible user errors from which we cannot protect. In addition, it is a distraction on the identification screen. The problem turned out to be that Swift itself wraps int by default in int32 for old phones and int64 for new ones.
Although there is support for int64 on older ones, it takes more time to calculate.
So there is no need to change to a string.
At first I tried to replace it with a string, it didn’t work out, but in the end I changed it to Int64 everywhere

They abandoned the geocoder due to correspondence with Kirill:
Pavel, 5:20PM
I'm comparing staging points right now, I received a list with 47 points without coordinates, of which the coordinates of 12 points were determined through the geocoder, in turn, some of them sobered up only in Russia.
And now the main question is whether this geocoder is needed then?
Birch, 5:22 PM
So, as I see it, it becomes labor-intensive, I propose to abandon the geocoder, since our ATMs are checked before uploading to the prod, that is, even if there are 0 coordinates, it is quickly identified and corrected / cut off
Paul 5:26 PM
yes, let's do it, because 47 points without coordinates, this means 47 requests to google api geocoder, of which, roughly speaking, 10 have now been resolved in the Kyrgyz Republic, 2 have been resolved in Russia, and all the rest have not been resolved at all

[~takt911] Coloring the linked map is done in such a way, in the appendix there is a list with a color palette of 10 gradients, we sum the last 4 digits of the map and take the remainder of the division by 10, as a result we get a number from 0 to 9, which we substitute into our list with palettes and pull out the gradient. Thus, on different phones under the same account in the application, the same card will be painted with the same color, but unfortunately there may be duplicate colors, but I think that is rare. Do you like this logic of card coloring?
[~pavel] Ok, I'll have to test it, users usually don't have many cards, but even then there is a risk that, for example, only 2 cards are tied up and both will be in the same color
cards are displayed in the color that is attached to them. all OK

In this sprint, we decided to design screens for transfers and card management, as well as to make a feature with selected payments (adding, deleting, viewing a list, paying for a selected service), transfer screens with confirmation to your card and to another card, and we will try to manage the transfer by user number phones.

Also, every Monday we will now upload the build to the TF. In this sprint, we plan to add payment and card binding.

We discussed caching the list of categories, now we have caching the list of categories, services, my maps, favorites in the current phone session. Ie once loaded the list and do not request it further. The next time, if the user re-enters the application, he will load the lists (make them up-to-date).

Service categories are cached for 2 weeks.

Services, favorites, list of maps - during the session.

ATMs - during the day.

All listings must be updated on pull to refresh.

1. E xem attachment nhe
2. E co thể lấy từ data warehouse bằng query:
{code}
SELECT
    bb.id AS bifrost_buyer_id
    , bb.email AS bifrost_buyer_email
    , bb.mobile AS bifrost_buyer_mobile
    , bt.combo AS bifrost_transaction_combo
    , bt.`method` AS bifrost_transaction_method
    , hours_add(bt.received_at, 7) AS bifrost_transaction_received_at -- In +07:00 timezone
FROM
    bifrost_transactions bt
INNER JOIN bifrost_buyers bb ON
    bt.bifrost_buyer_id = bb.id
WHERE
    status = 'success'
    AND (
        (
            combo IN (
                "Combo_DuongLT.04_DuongLT.14_DuongLT.17"
            )
            AND hours_add(received_at, 7) BETWEEN '2020-03-05' AND '2020-03-24' -- BETWEEN 2020-03-05 00:00:00 AND 2020-03-24 00:00:00
        )
        OR(
            combo IN (
                "Combo_Book_DuongLT8khoa"
                , "ComboSACH_DuongLT.04_DuongLT.17"
            )
            AND hours_add(received_at, 7) > '2020-03-24'
        )
    )
    ORDER BY bt.received_at ASC;
{code}

Hiên team cần có thông tin/tài liệu sau:
 * Làm thế nào để dev và test trên môi trường local.

# Để Run hệ thống trên môi trường local cần làm những việc sau:
 ## Có tài khoản GIT và kéo code về thư mục
 ## Cài đặt môi trường local
##1 cài đặt docker
 ubuntu:
 https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-use-docker-on-ubuntu-18-04
 windows:
 https://runnable.com/docker/install-docker-on-windows-10
 * docker-compose
 https://docs.docker.com/compose/install/
## 2. Các config mặc định
 domain: local.edumall.io
 ip web: 175.1.1.3
 ip-db: 175.1.1.2
 db-name: ecommerce
 db-use: root
 db-pass: root
## 3. Khởi chạy lần đầu
Docker được map thẳng vào port 80, (nếu có service đang chạy port 80 như nginx, lam, ... yêu cầu stop)
 * step 1: Sau khi git pull project về chạy
 sudo docker-compose build :lệnh build docker image
 sudo docker-compose up -d :lệnh khởi tạo container
 * step 2: Run command để create default database
 mysql -h 175.1.1.2 -u root --password=root ecommerce < docker/database/dockerDb.sql
 * step 3: Copy ssh private key đăng nhập git vào thư mục ssh
 -mặc định ssh key sẽ lưu ở ~/.ssh/ (nếu ở chỗ # thì đổi đường dẫn này trong command)
 cp ~/.ssh/id_rsa ./ssh/ && cp ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub ./ssh/
 * step 4: Vao docker web = command
 sudo docker exec -it evn-web bash
 * step 5: Tạo env.php từ env_docker.php
 cp app/etc/env_docker.php app/etc/env.php
 * step 6: Chạy tiếp các lệnh cài đặt
 composer update && bin/magento se:up && bin/magento se:d:c && bin/magento se:s:d -f --theme Edumall/winstrike && bin/magento se:s:d vi_VN -f --theme Edumall/winstrike && bin/magento c:f && bin/magento indexer:reindex && chmod -R 777 var/ pub/ generated/ && service php7.2-fpm restart
 key composer
 user: 281b0aa075e34c0b444af7169b5dac06
 pass: ff54f51748c316832154652bd54f6e52
## 4. cài đặt file host
 mở file /etc/hosts vào thêm dòng sau
 127.0.0.1local.edumall.vn
## 5. Truy cập local.edumall.io
## 6. Các lần sau chỉ chạy
 sudo docker-compose start : lệnh start container
 sudo docker-compose stop : lệnh stop container
 sudo docker exec -it evn-web bash : lệnh vào docker web (note. các command sẽ thao tác trong docker này)

2. Quy trình Test hiện tại sau khi deploy

Nhưng đọc nội dung của worker xử lý $BIFROST_ROOT/app/services/gateway/cod_transaction_service.rb có vấn đề như sau:
+ PSMO gửi dữ liệu chứa cod_code
+ BIFROST sử dụng PSMO's cod_code để mapping với các bifrost transactions
+ Các transaction bị lệch giữa PSMO và BIFROST đều ko có cod_code để mapping nên không thực hiện được quá trình cập nhật ngược lại bifrost cho đú Lng (8)
+ Có 1 số cod_code bị duplicate, ví dụ 7af27c. Dẫn tới update sai bifrost transaction.

1. Hệ thống log chỉ chứa thông tin có 3 ngày, không đủ để ktra.
2. Job đồng bộ dữ liệu SQS --> BIFROST chỉ xử lý happy case. Không ghi log khi gặp lỗi, cũng không có phương án để rerun.

Team IT
# Đang ngửi mùi lỗi chính là do chức năng đồng bộ trạng thái giao dịch từ Gambit (COD service) sang Bifrost (Payment service) bị lỗi (dữ liệu 2 bên bị lệch nhau. Gambit ghi nhận mà Bifrost không chuyển trạng thái).
# Lỗi này xảy ra bất thường (lúc bị lúc không). Cụ thể: từ 03/19 đến nay. 2 hệ thống này hoạt động bình thường và việc đồng bộ dữ liệu là đúng. Từ trước 03/19 thì bị đữ liệu 2 hệ thống bị vênh ([~khietbt] confirm)
# Team IT đã điều tra theo 2 hướng: 1) log hệ thống 2) log monitor service time up thì phát hiện.
* Log trên bifrost *KHÔNG* có ghi nhận thông tin ở các case lỗi. Nên khi có lỗi cũng ko có thông tin cóích để tracking lại. và cũng chỉ được lưu lại trong 3 ngày, sau đó đấy lên S3 lưu trữ.
* Log monitor service (time up) thì ghi nhận trên slack. do giới hạn của slack mà cũng chỉ còn ghi nhận đc log từ ngày 03/10 đến giờ. cả 2 hệ thống đều ko có downtime từ 10/03 đến nay ([~namvh] confirm)
# Với các điều kiện như vậy team IT ko thể tìm ra nguyên nhân gốc của lỗi này.
*Next steps:*
# Tam thời sale dùng số trên Gambit + và 1 phần dữ liệu trên bifrost (online payment, chuyển khoản) để làm báo cáo tháng 3
# Team IT sẽ đặt log trên bifrost và Gambit trong các case lỗi để điều tra về sau fix triệt để.

Chỉnh sửa lại mục 5.6 theo thông tin sau:

Edumall thực hiện hoàn tiền theo phương thức chuyển khoản ngân hàng, phí chuyển khoản nếu có phát sinh do khách hàng chịu chi phí. Tùy thuộc vào ngân hàng nhận, chi phí chuyển khoản sẽ khác nhau. Quý khách liên hệ với chuyên viên CSKH để biết thêm chi tiết.


* Khách hàng thanh toán transfer, gateway : số tiền KH nhận được = số tiền Edumall nhận được - chi phí chuyển khoản

* Khách hàng thanh toán bằng hình thức COD: số tiền KH nhận được = số tiền Edumall nhận được - (phí ship + chi phi chuyển khokhoản)

 * Nếu là Jira Service Desk thì vào:
 ** Description sửa mô tả thành: "This Jira Not In Use, please use topi.ca/wework to submit Jira Issue"
 ** Trên thông báo của Portal, mô tả portal ấy, sửa thành: "This Jira Not In Use, please use topi.ca/wework to submit Jira Issue"

Tạo bằng rails: *rails c* => *p = Payment.new(:cod_version => 'new', :email => 'email@edumall.vn', :method => 'gateway', :cod_code => mã code, :course_id => BSON::ObjectId('55b1c16f52696418a0000008') (Đây là id của course được mua) )* => *p.save*
 # *Có thể có hoặc không:* Tạo giao dịch trên bifrost, table *transactions*, class name: *Gateway::Transaction.*

blocked by WEWORK-282

em gửi: select
         sd.date_c3 ngay_dang_ki
         , ec3s.name ho_ten
         , ec3s.mobile sdt
         , eo.address
         , ec3s.source_url source_url
         , eo.utm_campaign
         , eo.utm_medium
         , case
            when ec3s.sub_department_id in (2001, 2002) then 'ecom'
            else 'van_hanh'
           end team_mkter
         , ec3s.type
         , es.email tvts_dang_care
         , egw.name team_sale
         , coalesce (sd4.payment_method_code, sd3.payment_method_code)
         , gp.name doi_tac_giao_van
         , ec3s.auto_cod_status ket_qua_auto_code
         , ec3s.id siren_id
         , 'NA' contact_commnert
         , ec3s.status trang_thai_contact
         , ec3s.source nguon
         , nu.email mkter
         , sd.levellevel_hien_tai
         , 'eros' he_thong_luu_tru
         , sd.date_c3 ngay_c3
         , sd5.date_lx ngaY_l1
         , sd2.date_lx ngaY_l2
         , sd3.date_lx ngaY_l7
         , sd4.date_lx ngaY_l8
         , ec3s.form_id
         , 'NA' code_note
         , 'NA' why_imported
    from dwhvn_prod.edumall_contactc3s ec3s
    left join (select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by contactc3_id order by date_lx desc) ranked from dwhvn_prod.sale_details sd) sd where sd.ranked = 1) sd on ec3s.id = sd.contactc3_id
    left join (select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by contactc3_id order by date_lx desc) ranked from dwhvn_prod.sale_details sd where sd.level = 'L1') sd where sd.ranked = 1) sd5 on ec3s. id = sd5.contactc3_id
    left join (select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by contactc3_id order by date_lx desc) ranked from dwhvn_prod.sale_details sd where sd.level = 'L2') sd where sd.ranked = 1) sd2 on ec3s. id = sd2.contactc3_id
    left join (select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by contactc3_id order by date_lx desc) ranked from dwhvn_prod.sale_details sd where sd.level = 'L7') sd where sd.ranked = 1) sd3 on ec3s. id = sd3.contactc3_id
    left join (select * from (select *, row_number() over(partition by contactc3_id order by date_lx desc) ranked from dwhvn_prod.sale_details sd where sd.level = 'L8') sd where sd.ranked = 1) sd4 on ec3s. id = sd4.contactc3_id
    left join dwhvn_prod.eros_group_works egw on sd.last_sub_department_sale_id = egw.id
    left join dwhvn_prod.eros_orders eo on eo.id = ec3s.id
    left join dwhvn_prod.eros_staffs es on es.id = sd.staff_id
    left join dwhvn_prod.gambit_partners gp on gp.id = sd.partner_id
    left join dwhvn_prod.nami_users nu on nu.id = ec3s.mkter_id
    where ec3s.source_system in ('Minerva', 'Eros')
    and hours_add(ec3s.created_at, 7) >= '2020-03-01'
    order by ec3s.created_at asc;

e gửi lại câu lệnh:
a Khiết xuất giúp e vớiạ

"WITH v_gb_order AS (
SELECT DISTINCT rgo.siren_id, g.lading_code, rgo.level
FROM ranked_gambit_orders rgo
LEFT JOIN gambit_orders g ON g.siren_id = rgo.siren_id AND g.partner_id = rgo.partner_id
)
select
    a.contactc3_id id_contact
    , bt.id id_thanh_toan
    , a.date_c3 ngay_c3
    , a.date_lx ngay_len_level_cuoi_cung
    , ec.name ho_ten
    , ec.mobile sdt
    , ec.email
    , coalesce(jc.code, a.khoahoc) khoa_hoc
    , a.revenue doanh_thu
    , a.source nguon
    , a.level
    , a.type loai
    , a.`method` phuong_thuc_thanh_toan
    , es.name doi_tac_cham_soc
    , vgo.lading_code ma_van_don
    , gp.name doi_tac_giao_van
from(
select contactc3_id
       ,date_c3
       ,date_lx
       ,staff_id
       ,source
       ,sub_department_sale_id
       ,coalesce(course_id, combo_code) khoahoc
       ,payment_method_code `method`
       ,level
       ,type
       ,partner_id
       ,revenue
       ,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY contactc3_id ORDER BY date_lx DESC) as ranked
from dwhvn_prod.sale_details
) a
join (select id, name from dwhvn_prod.eros_group_works where id in (
'5a98c38beed0400009792f50'
,'5a98c2f0aea09c00097578bc'
,'5ce12737a33cf80001b02f9a'
,'5cec9d1dab5330000165694d'
,'5d1cd4493736550001274d95'
,'5d92b9c5847172000183ba59'
,'5ca17b52ff4ae30001e39b5f'
)) es on es.id = a.sub_department_sale_id
left join dwhvn_prod.edumall_contactc3s ec on ec.id = a.contactc3_id
left join v_gb_order vgo on vgo.siren_id = a.contactc3_id and a.level = vgo.level
left join dwhvn_prod.ranked_bifrost_transactions bt on bt.siren_id = a.contactc3_id
left join dwhvn_prod.bifrost_transaction_details btd on btd.bifrost_transaction_id = bt.id
left join dwhvn_prod.jackfruit_courses jc on jc.id = a.khoahoc
left join dwhvn_prod.gambit_partners gp on gp.id = a.partner_id
where a.ranked = 1
and a.level = 'L8'
and date_c3 >= '2020-02-01' and date_c3 < '2020-03-01'
and date_lx >= '2020-02-01' and date_lx < '2020-03-11'"

*Root cause:*
+ Timestamp strong database được lưu ở UTC:
+ Data được display trên đơn được displayed theo timezone HN (GMT+7)
+ Data export được lấy trực tiếp từ DB lên và ghi vào file

{code}
function g_export() trong $EROS_ROOT//app/controllers/api/order_controller.rb

162 order['Thời gian đăng ký'] = row[5] && row[5].strftime('%H:%M %d/%m/%Y')
163 order['Thời gian lấy đơn hàng'] = row[6] && row[6].strftime('%H:%M %d/%m/%Y')
164 order['Thời gian chăm sóc lần cuối'] = row[7] && row[7].strftime('%H:%M %d/%m/%Y')
{code}

*Recommended solution*
+ Chuyển timezone của export data sang localtime
{code}
162 order['Thời gian đăng ký'] = row[5] && row[5].localtime.strftime('%H:%M %d/%m/%Y')
163 order['Thời gian lấy đơn hàng'] = row[6] && row[6].localtime.strftime('%H:%M %d/%m/%Y')
164 order['Thời gian chăm sóc lần cuối'] = row[7] && row[7].localtime.strftime('%H:%M
{code}

CC: [~hungcm].

Vì em thay đổi thông tin trên Kelly rồi nhưng nó không hiển thi trên Edumall.vn nên hôm trước họp vs It thì
- Ngắn hạn: Em cập nhật trên Kelley xong thì cập trên cả trên magento để nó hiển thị lên đã
- Dài hạn: các anh sẽ fix để thông được luồng của 2 con này mà em không phải double cập nhật cả 2 nữa

Nhưng giờ lại phát sinh vấn đề là: hôm nay, em cập nhật trular cả kelley và magento rồi nhưng heth bên ecommerce (linhntt16) reset giá lại flush cachm Dẫn đến việc khóa học lại bị refresh lại như lúc em chưa cập nhật

Trừ khi: hôm sau em lại update từ Kelly sang Edumall.vn, và em publish thì nó lên Edumall.vn luôn. Nên Edumall.vn đang hiển thi data ở Kelly bắn sang, ko còn là data ở Edumall.vn như e đã sửa nữa.

Discussed everything with Vlad. The following flow was adopted:

* When registering a user through our regs - everything works using the terms & conditions checkbox
* When registering a user through a social network - first we send the user to the social network for authorization, then we check with us. If the user is new, display the terms page until he agrees. If the user exists, authorize him

Have looked at Pusher, Pubnub and Ably services. The most suitable for us are Pubnub and Ably as they allow bring real-time messaging in the app without any difficulties, have api presence and hame multiple datacenters which will guarantee SLA 99.9%.

Ably pricing seems much transparent and use Websockets instead of http in comparison to Pubnub.

If we decide to develop custom whiteboard solution I would suggest use Ably for realtime collaboration on the whiteboard and later for teachers on Lesson planning

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] Hello, assignment message notifications. Yesterday I finalized the notifications according to the new logic, issued the MR. Got a little feedback from Slava, almost fixed it.
But Slava also noticed an inconsistency in the case when the user is in a chat and at this moment he does not need to create notifications about new messages. The current front knows whether the user is in the chat or not, since he works with sockets (socket js is used there, he tinkered a little, tested it). So far I see one of the possible solutions: The front monitors when a certain user entered the chat or left and sends a request for back for each action --> Back, in turn, writes this to redis and, based on this data, understands the need to send a notification

1. On the implementation from the front, I will now talk with Roma
2. For the implementation of this thing, I propose to do it as a separate task, and when Roma (or not Roma) already starts doing assignment chats (Now I’ll describe in detail the task for the front and back)
- I talked with Naki and Roma and on the implementation described above, they answered that it is feasible

- Glory in the comments to MP wrote that I should use the `ignoreSubscriptionsOnce()` method
- I figured out the logic of this method, as well as `ignoreSubscriptions();`. I realized that when adding this method, notifications will always be sent, regardless of the user's subscriptions
- Phoned Slava, discussed how and why these methods were created
- I decided to temporarily add them for the time being, until I turn on / off subscriptions to notification data from the front in the UI. As soon as the front makes configurataion, I will remove these methods and add a subscription to the necessary notifications to all users by migration
- Now I can’t add a subscription to the necessary notifications by migration, as they will be erased when configuring other notifications on the front

- Investigated current feed logic a bit.
- Need to create new endpoint(feed-preview) that will retrieve preview instances for lesson and assign meant comments. Front will need this data on main page load.
- Later depending on with icon the user pressed, the front will make a request to fetch messages

Login with Microsoft teams and office 365 is the same thing and called Sign in with Microsoft button. The idea behind Sign in Button is the same as Google Sign In. We should ask for proper scopes and permissions before the user is able to login using Microsoft account. When user successfully signs in with Microsoft account we should authenticate / register user on the backend

Documentation website: [https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/identity/add-sign-in-with-microsoft|https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/identity/add-sign- in-with-microsoft]

Documentation for SPA apps: [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/tutorial-v2-javascript-spa|https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/ azure/active-directory/develop/tutorial-v2-javascript-spa]


In order to login we need only basic scopes such as {{User.Read}} I’m not sure about {{openid}} and {{profile}} if they are not needed then do not ask for scopes.
already implemented.

*Facebook*: ( there are 2 methods, can only be done via [php|https://github.com/facebookarchive/php-graph-sdk/blob/master/docs/examples/facebook_login.md], can be done via [php+ js |https://github.com/facebookarchive/php-graph-sdk/blob/master/docs/examples/access_token_from_javascript.md]

More info: [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/php/gettingstarted/4.0.0/|https://developers.facebook.com/docs/php/gettingstarted/4.0.0/]

[https://github.com/facebookarchive/php-graph-sdk/tree/master/docs|https://github.com/facebookarchive/php-graph-sdk/tree/master/docs|smart-link]

# Need to add Sign-in/Sign-up button
# Add authentication with PHP backend
# When teacher user sign-in first time we need to create an account. (by swiping through the modal about the policy)
# In the auth process, after app will be verified also need to fetch and save the {{user_id}} claim. {{user_id}} value is a user_id in facebook.

*Linkedin*: (the idea is the same as in google and facebook, there are also several methods, you can use [js|https://developer.linkedin.com/docs/js-sdk/tutorials/sign-in] +php , via [php|https://github.com/zoonman/linkedin-api-php-client] sdk, another [sdk|https://github.com/Happyr/LinkedIn-API-client])



*Found another integration option* [https://github.com/hybridauth/hybridauth|https://github.com/hybridauth/hybridauth|smart-link] ,

More info [https://hybridauth.github.io/|https://hybridauth.github.io/]

It has Supported providers [https://hybridauth.github.io/providers.html|https://hybridauth.github.io/providers.html], it includes facebook, linkedin, google, microsoft graph


here is how you can use linkedin using hybridoauth

[https://artisansweb.net/how-to-implement-login-with-linkedin-in-website-with-php/|https://artisansweb.net/how-to-implement-login-with-linkedin- in-website-with-php/]

[~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] FYI:

* fixed case when student can be invited as collaborator
* fixed case when teacher, that logically can’t view template, can open it by direct link (from invite email too)

Now we have 2 collab invite logic: for registered and for unregistered users (both by email).


* In first case user will get email with direct link to the lesson. So button caption{{Accept invitation }}is incorrect, i believe.
* In second case, user (email) will get link, that redirect him to the registration page with pre-filled email. After registration he will be attached to the lesson as collaborator.



About redirect for unregistered:

If teacher add unregistered user as collaborator, this email will got different link, that will heading to registration page.
So if already registered and logged in user opens that link → he will be redirected to self dashboard, without attaching as collaborator to the lesson. This is logically correct behaviour.
If logged in teacher will log out from self account and opens that link → he will be redirect to the registration page, when he can register new account and become collaborator in that lesson.

Behavior, when you click on the link and system will automatically log you out and redirect to the registration page is incorrect, i guess.

Yes, we need to remove it, I'll create a subtask here

- Discussed with Gulya LessonCommentController store and storeMediaComment methods and their difference

1. store() is used by front for text messages and files
2. storeMediaComment() is used by front for video and audio messages

How store() works:

Front sends file via HTTP request --> back stores file to s3, generates URLs and stores it to asset

How storeMediaComment() works:

Front sends request to generatePreSignUrl endpoint -- back responds back get and putURL --> Front saves file to s3 --> Front sends geturl to back -- Back saves URL to asset

Second method is better, because file is not being sent to back(if file is big, it might take time). So the better solution would be to create a single store method, that recieves only generated URL(ulr is being created via generatePreSignUrl).

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] [~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] about ably:

ably has 3 paid plans:

[https://www.ably.io/pricing|https://www.ably.io/pricing]

And more free. I just didn’t quite understand, there is a free account where you can send up to 3 million messages a month for free (the concept of messages is described in more detail in the section “*How are messages counted?*“, [https://www.ably.io/pricing |https://www.ably.io/pricing]), 100 simultaneously connected devices, and 100 simultaneous channels. Only I didn’t find anywhere where they write that this plan can be used for business sites.

If we are not allowed to use a free account, I think we could start with Self-service. Here's more about the count:

[https://www.ably.io/pricing/calculator|https://www.ably.io/pricing/calculator] . On average, this plan allows you to have:

500 competitive connections at the same time (that is, you can have up to 500 active connections at the same time, during the month you can have at least as many active connections, the main thing is not to exceed 500 at the same time)

And sending up to 6 million messages, 200 thousand per day (then the cost doubles if the limit is exceeded). then look at other plans, if necessary.

Also for storing data on their servers: you can use the service only for transporting data, i.e. sent data, and active users received them in real time, and then the data is deleted after 2 minutes.

You can store data longer, you need to specify how long we will store it. [https://www.ably.io/documentation/realtime/history|https://www.ably.io/documentation/realtime/history] - here is more about it.

As a result, I think that you can start using the service, at least with a free account (you need to find out by writing to their support about the business site), test it, if there are show-offs, then look at other options.

_if the quizzes are not one-time, you need a field to understand where the answer came from._

*canvas*:

_view_
get id via GET /sections?lesson_id
all info is pulled through /activities/\{id}

_store_
POST phases/\{id}/activities - with activity payload
GET activities/\{id} - created entity data
POST activities/\{id}/bulk-questions - *_describe updated payload_*

*Student flow*

enter canvas -> GET student-dashboard/activities/\{id}
‘begin lesson’
load quiz description
‘start quiz’

GET student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/questions - loads only current active question
POST student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/questions/\{question_object_id} with answer id payload
POST student-dashboard/activity/\{id}/finish - return summary
_until quiz not retaken, activities/\{id} will return quiz in payload with ‘finish’ status, initial or retaked status is ‘not-viewed’._
GET student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/retake

_Some student flow notes_

student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/questions:

* returns only actual question (not answered yet)
* start quiz/answer expiring job
* expiring counters expiring through Redis:
** one job with timer, that will set answers to id => 0 if question was not answered,
** second - hset with startTime and endTime -> on finish() will check is quiz expired and expire if not. _Question expires in Redis just for page reloading? answer saves without checking this data_


student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/questions/\{question_object_id}:

* make correct answer payload, save student answer into db (here we can handle single/multiple/fill-blank choices)


student-dashboard/activities/\{id}/retake:

* checks isQuizPassed && canRetake
* reset results (delete stored answers), increment attempts, return activity entity

[~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] FYI

[~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] in theory a student can't register without a teacher invite. What will be displayed to him there if he has neither a class nor a lesson? And he doesn’t need to be given workspace management either. On the technical side, a student is a user and must have his own workspace where he is an admin, but because the student cannot work on the content in a collaborative mode as a teacher, it makes no sense for him to display the workspace.
What I would do here: Do not bother the student with the creation of a workspace, but automatically create a workspace for him, but in the list of workspaces, return only those in which he is not an admin.
[~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] [~accountid:557058:4d51e61f-f264-4dac-b7cd-d45ab512d07e] [~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] platform, that would be cool. But if this is not possible, then create an empty personal workspace, but do not display it.

[~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] wokspace )
If a student creates a workspace and registers it as an owner there, he will become a teacher-admin.

The student must be linked to the workspace in order to assign the student role to it (the student role is an entry in the table {{users_organisations_roles_join}} with {{role_id = 2}})

{noformat}$student; // some just registered user
$workspace; // teacher that made invite, his workspace
$workspace->attachUserAsStudent($student);{noformat}

Chat questions between teacher and students (in the assignment):

# Whether notifications are needed for the student / teacher (new message). Settings for these notifications in account-settings (needed or not)
# The teacher's circle now looks like a chat with a list of teachers, how should it look if students are added there? And what will circle look like for a student? Or will messages from students not fall into the circle?
!61a31402-ce19-47af-ab6f-0fb2ccfc7519#media-blob-url=true&id=52fb610b-a2ef-4069-bac5-a4c3a2dd2605&collection=upload-user-collection--944771438&contextId=19637&mime-1ageType=image%2Fpng2051=image%2Fpng2051 png&size=137204&width=484&height=638|width=484,height=638!

# Now the teacher can delete his messages (in the chat between teachers). Can a teacher delete student posts? Notification for the student in case of deletion of the message
!image-20201007-111443.png|width=558,height=278!

# The teacher has the ability to send files/audio/video. Does the student still have this option?
# Access on a subscription plan, are there any restrictions?
# Should the students/teacher see a list of everyone present in the chat (essentially in the lesson)?

[~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6]

# Need both notifications and settings
# The student's Circle looks the same as the teacher's. Since this is a chat that takes place in the lesson, the icon and color of the lesson (or a cover picture when we develop it) are displayed in the avatar. The Student and teacher have the same Circle. The list of participants is not displayed, both can only see the messages posted there by other students, the student himself and the teacher.
!Screenshot 2020-10-14 at 14.48.00.png|width=739,height=905!

# The teacher can only delete their own posts. Just like a student - only their own messages
# yes, student can send video and audio and files
# The student has no restrictions, the teacher depends on the subscription, the rules for the chat are the same as on the side of the teacher with different subscripts
# Not currently in this solution. When we make the Whiteboard, there will be this opportunity

for now, I have removed Add personal data step. Have deployed changes to [https://dev.teacherly.io/|https://dev.teacherly.io/], pls, check

changelog:

* Browsersync replaced with webpack-dev-server
* Added webpack-cli (required webpack-dev-server)
* {{HtmlWebpackPlugin}} and {{index.ejs}} removed since we do not need for index.html
* {{webpack.NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin()}} removed from config plugins. Webpack use it [by default|https://webpack.js.org/plugins/NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin/]
* Remove exposed 3001 port from {{front}} service in docker-compose
* Fix HMR with setting properly {{entry}} and {{output->publicPath}} setting for {{react-hot-loader}}
* Remove unused html-webpack-plugin, webpack-dev-middleware, webpack-hot-middleware
* Use {{eval-cheap-module-source-map}}. No {{.map}} file emitted. Filename displayed correctly. Line number displayed correctly. The file referenced by the error: The original source code is displayed.
!image-20201007-055232.png|width=1020,height=176!

* Remove unrelated options in {{MiniCssExtractPlugin}} and shorter test pattern.
* Remove {{ws_nodemodules}} volume. Remove {{npm run stop-ws}} from ws service, it make no sense.

[~accountid:557058:dc97fe24-bdda-4965-9046-7974ad38ae38], [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] finally\! I reproduced this bug today:

My way to reproduce it was the following:

Open any Lesson template and add/delete text on canvas rapidly.

Within one minute of performing this action I was able to get the following screen:

!image-20201013-125802.png|width=1600,height=879!

!image-20201013-125939.png|width=938,height=877!

!image-20201013-125950.png|width=946,height=346!

[https://www.loom.com/share/b4bc7635354d4121adb91f5f4fdd2d93|https://www.loom.com/share/b4bc7635354d4121adb91f5f4fdd2d93]

When a request to {{storeCommand}} {{(POST api/teacher/phases/{id}/commands)}} returns a response other than {{200}}, the canvas cancels the last (or current?) operation.

Sometimes requests to add a command are “lost”, do not reach the server, and subsequently fall off after a timeout of 60 seconds. ({{504 response}}). It is still difficult to say what this is connected with, whether the server is overloaded (for example, during deployment) or something between the client and the server.

If the request to add a command hangs, but nothing is done on the canvas after it, {{504}} is returned and the last (or current?) command is canceled.

If the request to add a command is hung, but after it at least 1 request is made, then with a 504 response and an attempt to cancel the last (current?) command, the object (storage?) responsible for the sections / phases breaks.

Roughly speaking, if after the start and before the end of the request, which will return a 504 error, the state of the object (storage?) changes, when you try to cancel the command, the phases fly off.

[~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] checked this bug, managed to reproduce it locally.

The frontend now processes commands in the following way. The user executes the command, changes are immediately displayed on the canvas (the command is executed on local storage), but this does not yet mean that the back has successfully recorded the executed command. If suddenly an error occurs on the backend, the frontend cancels itself (the command is canceled on local storage). I found the reason for the disappearance of the phases, our code was designed to handle an error when the server immediately throws an error. And now this bug occurs when several commands on the server accumulate, and all of them in a row begin to respond with a timeout (504). And the front will not be able to quickly catch these errors, cancel them from local storage, since we also have undo / redo. It is necessary to remove all these unexecuted commands in a row from the undo / redo stack and visually return them to the state of the last successfully executed command.

At the moment I see 2 ways to handle this error:

# Deal with canceling failed commands from local storage and the undo/redo stack. It takes time.
# At 504 we show an error about the error (not necessarily the whole page, just as a small note), and auto-request the last state of the commands of a certain phase from the server, here you can simply clear the undo / redo history. This is a fast option.
[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] here the problem is solved only by the front.

h1. backend

* [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8085|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8085|smart-link]
* Refactor Authentication. Define JWT for all api endpoints. Use one auth service.
* Refactor exceptions handling and error responses. Inner classes should not return responses, logic with responses should only be handling in controller class. ([https://laraveldaily.com/laravel-api-errors-and-exceptions-how-to-return-responses/|https://laraveldaily.com/laravel-api-errors-and-exceptions-how-to -return-responses/])
* Refactor API error response format, define the standard way to handle errors. Use standard [laravel solution|https://laravel.com/docs/8.x/validation#working-with-error-messages] no need reasons to override it. ([https://laraveldaily.com/laravel-api-errors-and-exceptions-how-to-return-responses/|https://laraveldaily.com/laravel-api-errors-and-exceptions-how-to -return-responses/])
* [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6593|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6593|smart-link]
* Use one Google Account for all service APIs. Also do not need to have many projects, just use one project for production and one for dev/staging/local development. Because multiple projects/accounts hard to maintain.

h1. front end

* Configure sentry for all frontend related projects. Sentry should not be enabled in the local environment. Setup file maps and environment settings. [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8464|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8464|smart-link]
* [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6118|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6118|smart-link]
* Move front end part to its own project.
* Move websockets to its own project.

h1. Infrastructure

* Configure log aggregation and log formatters for all services ([https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6165|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6165|smart-link] ).
* Configure metrics for better observability. ([https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6166|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6166|smart-link] )
* Create alerts for critical service paths.
* Better way to Secrets Management use systems like [Hashicorp Vault|https://www.hashicorp.com/products/vault/secrets-management]. Gitlab already [starts work|https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-runner/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v1340-2020-09-18] in this way.
* [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8547|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8547|smart-link]

Found in laravel docs. Starting with MySQL 5.7, {{0000-00-00 00:00:00}} is no longer considered a valid date. As documented at the [+Laravel 5.2 upgrade guide+|https://laravel.com/docs/5.2/upgrade#upgrade-5.2.0], all timestamp columns should receive a valid default value when you insert records into your database. You may use the {{useCurrent()}} column modifier (from Laravel 5.1.25 and above) in your migrations to default the timestamp columns to the current timestamps, or you may make the timestamps {{nullable()}} to allow null values.
yuxttp://mosklserverteam.com/muscle-8-0-van-to-use-utf8mb3-over-utf8mb4/|http://mosklserverteam.com/muscle-8-0-van-to-use-utf8mb3-over -utf8mb4/u
Also find this solution [https://stackoverflow.com/a/42747508/3840005|https://stackoverflow.com/a/42747508/3840005].

Rolled, in short:

when registering, the user has no {{bio}}, {{facebook}}, {{twitter}}, {{linkedin}} fields in {{data}} (json object) in the database.

It will be possible to repeat only on old registered accounts that did not go through onboarding (it updates the data) and in which the profile was not edited:

* Login
* Go to Account settings -> Personal data
* Change the name without touching the bio + social network fields (important)
* Save

Problem found, described.
Problem has same root causes as linked \[TILT-8122] bug
Will investigate deeper.

In response {{lessons/{id}/state}} comes a list of collaborators.
Also comes {{organization_id}} (which the lesson refers to).

Check flow (tolerance) for editing the canvas:

* If the current teacher is *in* the list of collaborators - enable canvas edit.
* If the current teacher is *not* on the list of collaborators:
** If {{organisation_id}} of lesson == {{active_organization_id}} of teacher - check permissions (can/can not edit lesson).
** If the {{organization_id}} of the lesson \!= {{active_organization_id}} of the teacher - disable editing.

Through this flow, it is impossible to handle adding/removing a teacher as a collaborator, changing the active workspace on another tab, or removing a teacher from the workspace.
This issue should be addressed comprehensively, along with [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|smart-link] , [https:/ /lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|smart-link]

16) System variables with new default values
  Warning: Following system variables that are not defined in your
    configuration file will have new default values. Please review if you rely on
    their current values and if so define them before performing upgrade.
  More information:
    https://mysqlserverteam.com/new-defaults-in-mysql-8-0/

  back_log - default value will change
  character_set_server - default value will change from latin1 to utf8mb4
  collation_server - default value will change from latin1_swedish_ci to
    utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
  event_scheduler - default value will change from OFF to ON
  explicit_defaults_for_timestamp - default value will change from OFF to ON
  innodb_autoinc_lock_mode - default value will change from 1 (consecutive) to
    2 (interleaved)
  innodb_flush_method - default value will change from NULL to fsync (Unix),
    unbuffered (Windows)
  innodb_flush_neighbors - default value will change from 1 (enable) to 0
    (disable)
  innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct - default value will change from 75 (%)  90 (%)
  innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct_lwm - default value will change from_0 (%) to 10
    (%)
  innodb_undo_log_truncate - default value will change from OFF to ON
  innodb_undo_tablespaces - default value will change from 0 to 2
  log_bin - default value will change from OFF to ON
  log_error_verbosity - default value will change from 3 (Notes) to 2 (Warning)
  log_slave_updates - default value will change from OFF to ON
  master_info_repository - default value will change from FILE to TABLE
  max_error_count - default value will change from 64 to 1024
  optimizer_trace_max_mem_size - default value will change from 16KB to 1MB
  performance_schema_consumer_events_transactions_current - default value will
    change from OFF to ON
  performance_schema_consumer_events_transactions_history - default value will
    change from OFF to ON
  relay_log_info_repository - default value will change from FILE to TABLE
  server_id - default value will change from 0 to 1
  slave_rows_search_algorithms - default value will change from 'INDEX_SCAN,
    TABLE_SCAN' to 'INDEX_SCAN, HASH_SCAN'
  table_open_cache - default value will change from 2000 to 4000
  transaction_write_set_extraction - default value will change from OFF to
    XXHASH64
